name: HighsModelUtils
brief:
Utility functions for model analysis and solution output

Free functions for analyzing models and writing solution files.

**Model Analysis:**
- analyseModelBounds(): Report statistics on variable/constraint bounds
- hasNamesWithSpaces(): Check for problematic whitespace in names

**Solution Output:**
- writeModelBoundSolution(): Write variable/constraint solution to file
- writeModelObjective(): Write objective function evaluation
- writeLpObjective(): Write LP objective evaluation
- writeObjectiveValue(): Write scalar objective value
- writePrimalSolution()/writeDualSolution(): Export primal/dual values
- writeSolutionFile(): Write complete solution to file

**Model Status:**
- utilModelStatusToString(): Convert HighsModelStatus to string
- utilBasisStatusToString(): Convert HighsBasisStatus to string
